text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide fhir.nigeriaImmunizationIG

NigeriaimmunizationFHIRIG

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://nphcda.gov.ng/immunizationIG/ImplementationGuide/fhir.nigeriaImmunizationIG

Nigeria Immunization FHIR IG

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: location-example
resource.description: An example immunization service location.

resource.name: NG-Imm Administrative Wards
resource.description: Captures the administrative ward within a geographic address

resource.name: NG-Imm Administrative Wards CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines ward codes and names mapped to their respective Local Government Areas (LGAs) in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm Adverse Event Clinical Status CS
resource.description: A classification system that represents the current clinical status of an individual who experienced an Adverse Event Following Immunization (AEFI), based on medical observation, investigation, or follow-up assessment.

resource.name: NG-Imm Allergy Dose Number
resource.description: Reference immunization dose number for this AllergyIntolerance.

resource.name: NG-Imm AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: Nigeria Immunization Allergy Intolerance Profile

resource.name: NG-Imm Client Age in Months
resource.description: Age of the Immunization Client recorded in months

resource.name: NG-Imm Client Age in Weeks
resource.description: Age of the Immunization Client recorded in weeks

resource.name: NG-Imm Client Age in Years
resource.description: Age of the Immunization Client recorded in years

resource.name: NG-Imm Client CapabilityStatement
resource.description: Describes expected behavior of clients consuming immunization services using the Nigerian profiles.

resource.name: NG-Imm Client HIV status CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines list of options for HIV status of a Client

resource.name: NG-Imm Client HIV Status VS
resource.description: Client HIV Status

resource.name: NG-Imm Client Preganancy Status VS
resource.description: Client Pregnancy Status

resource.name: NG-Imm Client Pregnancy status CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines list of options for Pregnancy status of a Client

resource.name: NG-Imm Client's HIV status
resource.description: The HIV status (positive, negative, or unknown) of the Immunization Client

resource.name: NG-Imm Client's Pregnancy status
resource.description: The Pregnancy status (pregnant or not-pregnant) of the Immunization Client

resource.name: NG-Imm Clinical Status VS
resource.description: The outcome of the reaction

resource.name: NG-Imm Digital Signature
resource.description: A digital or electronic signature capturing who signed, when, type, and signature data.

resource.name: NG-Imm Dose Series
resource.description: Dose series number from the referenced Immunization.protocolApplied.doseNumber.

resource.name: NG-Imm Encounter
resource.description: A profile for encounters in the Nigerian  Immunization guide, used to document immunization visits and related healthcare interactions.

resource.name: NG-Imm Example AEFI case report
resource.description: An example case of Adverse Event Following Immunization Report

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Full Immunization Patient
resource.description: A Nigeria Immunization Patient instance with all required and optional fields populated

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Immunization-Completed BCG Vaccination
resource.description: An example of a completed BCG immunization event

resource.name: NG-Imm Example MeasureReport Monthly Immunization Coverage Summary - BCG
resource.description: An example of a summary MeasureReport generated for BCG coverage at a facility

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Organization
resource.description: Represents a health facility in Kogi State providing immunization services for use in Bundle

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Organization
resource.description: A fictional example of a typical organization.

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Patient
resource.description: A sample patient conforming to the Nigeria Immunization Patient profile

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Patient with Ward data
resource.description: A fictional example of a patient with information on administrative ward

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Practitioner
resource.description: An example of a Nigerian Routine Immunization Officer

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Sibling
resource.description: An example of a mother's other child as a RelatedPerson resource.

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Sibling - Mother's Other Child
resource.description: An example of a mother's other child as a RelatedPerson resource.

resource.name: NG-Imm Example Stock report
resource.description: An example Stock management report

resource.name: NG-Imm ExampleAllergyIntolerance
resource.description: A fictional example of a an allergy resulting from Immunization.

resource.name: NG-Imm Facility Type CS
resource.description: A standardized classification system used to describe the type or level of health facility within a healthcare delivery system, based on the scope of services provided, staffing, infrastructure, and administrative role.

resource.name: NG-Imm Gender CS
resource.description: The administrative gender of a person.

resource.name: NG-Imm Gender or Sex VS
resource.description: Subset of HL7 administrative-gender limited to 'male' and 'female'.

resource.name: NG-Imm HealthFacility Type VS
resource.description: Classification of Nigerian health facilities

resource.name: NG-Imm Immunization
resource.description: Nigerian Profile for Immunization resource.

resource.name: NG-Imm Immunization Contraindicated
resource.description: Indicates whether the immunization was contraindicated

resource.name: NG-Imm Immunization Session types CS
resource.description: Type of session for immunization. Could be in a fixed facility, outreach or mobile.

resource.name: NG-Imm Languages VS
resource.description: The Patient's preferred language for communication.

resource.name: NG-Imm LGAs in Nigeria CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines LGA codes and names mapped to their respective States in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm LGAs VS
resource.description: The administrative Local Government Areas where a person or a facility is.

resource.name: NG-Imm Location
resource.description: A profile for immunization service locations, including health facilities, outreach sites, and mobile vaccination units.

resource.name: NG-Imm Location Owner
resource.description: The owner of an Immunization location

resource.name: NG-Imm Location Owner CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines Immunization Location Owner.

resource.name: NG-Imm Measure
resource.description: A profile on the Measure resource used to define immunization indicators within Nigeria's routine immunization program.

resource.name: NG-Imm MeasureReport
resource.description: Nigeria Immunization Measure Report Profile

resource.name: NG-Imm Next Dose Date
resource.description: The recommended due date for the next vaccine dose in the schedule.

resource.name: NG-Imm Organization
resource.description: An organization profile representing healthcare facilities responsible for immunization services or other types of organizations.

resource.name: NG-Imm owner of health institution
resource.description: An extension to define the owner of the health institution

resource.name: NG-Imm Patient
resource.description: Nigeria Immunization Patient Profile

resource.name: NG-Imm Practitioner
resource.description: Profile for a Nigerian Practitioner

resource.name: NG-Imm RelatedPerson
resource.description: Sibling that represents the mother's other children as RelatedPersons.

resource.name: NG-Imm Relationships CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines list of persons related to a patient, but who is not a direct target of care

resource.name: NG-Imm Relationships VS
resource.description: list of persons related to a patient, but who is not a direct target of care.

resource.name: NG-Imm Routine Immunization Report - Facility A
resource.description: A routine monthly immunization report summarizing vaccine stock and usage for Facility A.

resource.name: NG-Imm Scheduled Pentavalent Immunization Not Done Due to Fever
resource.description: An example where immunization was not done due to contraindication (fever)

resource.name: NG-Imm Search by Patient lga of residence
resource.description: Search by patient LGA of residence

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Immunization by date of vaccination
resource.description: Search Immunization records by date of vaccination

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Immunization by patient
resource.description: Search Immunization records by patient

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Immunization by status of immunization
resource.description: Search Immunization records by status (eg. completed, or not done)

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Immunization by vaccine code
resource.description: Search Immunization records by vaccination code

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Patient by birth date
resource.description: Search by patient birth date

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Patient by date of creation
resource.description: Search by patient's date of creation

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Patient by firstname
resource.description: Search by patient firstname

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Patient by gender
resource.description: Search by patient gender

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Patient by Identifier
resource.description: Search by patient identifier

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Patient by lastname
resource.description: Search by patient lastname

resource.name: NG-Imm Search Patient by state
resource.description: Search by patient's State of residence

resource.name: NG-Imm Search patient record by city, town or settlement
resource.description: Search patient records by city, town or settlement

resource.name: NG-Imm Search patient record by phone number or email address
resource.description: Search patient record by phone number or email address

resource.name: NG-Imm Server CapabilityStatement
resource.description: Describes the expected behavior of systems serving immunization data based on the NgImmPatient and NgImmImmunization profiles.

resource.name: NG-Imm Session Type
resource.description: Type of session for immunization (e.g., fixed-site clinic, outreach session, campaign site).

resource.name: NG-Imm Session Type VS
resource.description: Type of session for immunization. Could be in a fixed facility, outreach or mobile.

resource.name: NG-Imm Sibling Health Status CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines the health of the client's sibling

resource.name: NG-Imm Sibling Health Status VS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines the health of the client's sibling

resource.name: NG-Imm Sibling's health status
resource.description: The health status of the Client's sibling

resource.name: NG-Imm States in Nigeria CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines ward codes and names mapped to their respective States in Nigeria.

resource.name: NG-Imm States VS
resource.description: The state where a person or a facility is.

resource.name: NG-Imm Stock Management Data Elements CS
resource.description: CodeSystem for Stock Management Data Elements

resource.name: NG-Imm Vaccine Contraindication VS
resource.description: A set of standardized codes used to represent clinical conditions, diagnoses, or circumstances that serve as contraindications to the administration of one or more vaccines.

resource.name: NG-Imm Vaccine Contraindications
resource.description: Indicates specific situations in which it is not recommended to administer certain vaccines (e.g severe AEFI, History of Anaphylactic reactions, Symptomatic HIV infection)

resource.name: NG-Imm Vaccine contraindications CS
resource.description: A set of standardized codes used to represent clinical conditions, diagnoses, or circumstances that serve as contraindications to the administration of one or more vaccines.

resource.name: NG-Imm Vaccine Library with SNOMED CT codes
resource.description: CodeSystem for IMMZ.Z Vaccine Library Data Elements supported by this IG using SNOMED CT codes

resource.name: NG-Imm VaccineLibrary VS
resource.description: A curated list of vaccines recognized under Nigeria's national immunization program

resource.name: NG-Imm Wards VS
resource.description: The administrative Ward (within an LGA) where a person or a facility is.

resource.name: NG-Imm Weight at birth
resource.description: Weight  of the Immunization Client at birth

resource.name: NG-Imm-A RegisterFacility[information only]
resource.description: IMMZ.A - A logical model representing a health facility being registered in the immunization system.

resource.name: NG-Imm-C5 RegisterClient[information only]
resource.description: IMMZ.C5 - A logical model representing a client being registered in the immunization system.

resource.name: NG-Imm-C6 UpdateClientHistory[information only]
resource.description: IMMZ.C6 - A logical model for tracking client immunization history updates.

resource.name: NG-Imm-D AdministerVaccine[information only]
resource.description: IMMZ.D - A logical model for capturing vaccine administration details

resource.name: NG-Imm-E Manage & ReportAEFI[information only]
resource.description: IMMZ.E - A logical model for recording and managing AEFI treatment.

resource.name: NG-Imm-G DefaulterTracking[information only]
resource.description: IMMZ.G - A logical model for tracking immunization defaulters.

resource.name: NG-Imm-H GenerateReport[information only]
resource.description: IMMZ.H - Data elements for the IMMZ.G Report Generation Data Dictionary.

resource.name: NGImm Example AllergyIntolerance
resource.description: Example allergy or intolerance record using use in Bundle example AllergyIntolerance profile

resource.name: NGImm Example Immunization Record
resource.description: Example Immunization record using NG-Imm Immunization profile with 90% data populated

resource.name: NGImm Example Patient used in Bundle
resource.description: Sample patient for use with Bunlde and resident in Kogi State

resource.name: NGImm Example Sibling used in bundle
resource.description: Represents a sibling (mother's other child) related to the immunization client for use in Bundle

resource.name: NG‑Imm Languages in Nigeria CS
resource.description: This CodeSystem defines codes for major languages spoken across Nigeria.

resource.name: Nigeria Immunization Bundle
resource.description: FHIR Bundle profile for grouping Nigeria Immunization resources including Patient, Immunization, AllergyIntolerance, RelatedPerson, and Organization. Supports request/response/search metadata for interoperability.

resource.name: Nigeria Immunization Example Bundle
resource.description: Example bundle containing Patient, Immunization, AllergyIntolerance, RelatedPerson, and Organization with request, response, and search metadata.

resource.name: Search Bundle by Last Updated Date
resource.description: Retrieve bundles based on last updated timestamp

resource.name: Search Bundle by Organization Identifier
resource.description: Retrieve bundles that reference a specific healthcare organization/facility

resource.name: Search Bundle by Patient BirthDate
resource.description: Retrieve bundles where the Patient has a specific birth date

resource.name: Search Bundle by Patient Identifier
resource.description: Allows search of NgImmBundle resources where the embedded Patient has a specific identifier (e.g., NIN)

resource.name: Search Bundle by Patient State
resource.description: Retrieve bundles where the Patient resides in a specific Nigerian State

resource.name: Search Bundle by Vaccine Code
resource.description: Searches bundles containing a specific vaccine code in Immunization
